website_summaries.verdict: This bulky action figure feels as weighty and tough as the Hulk Buster should, and Iron Man’s many speech options make this an extra-fun Avengers toy.
pros: Talks with other toys in the series, like Hulk and Ultron
Features “Jackhammer Punch” button on right arm

customer_reviews.title: Big, cool sounds, sturdy. Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my three year old a small Hulkbuster figure for his birthday and had to repent at Christmas for not getting him "the big one". This one has it all. Sturdy, stands up and has the cool jackhammer fist. Says a bunch of fun lines and has cool sound effects. This is perfect for my Avengers fanatic kiddo. I have redeemed myself as a parent.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor Crafty

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his hulk buster!! His sayings are fun for him and it’s interactive with his other marvel figures. The Hulkbuster is sitting on my son’s play kitchen. You can see how big it is in relation to other objects.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Come on it the hulk buster it’s AWSOME!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For a 2 year he went bonkers and it’s durable and he has the hulk as well and now he has the set thanks guys came on time my nephew never lets it go almost as big as him but he carries like it’s the greatest toy ever
customer_reviews.author: Rubicon

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, compliments the rest of my sons avenger ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, compliments the rest of my sons avenger toys, lets him have great battles with the Hulk. The toy is very durable and seems well made, restrictive movement of parts but all the avenger toys are similar. def worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Hulk doesn't fit in here, but the electronics make up for it. Perfect for birthday gift for any kid who loves the Avengers.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D. Marsh II

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son (3yo) loves hulk buster so he obviously loves this toy. Pretty much no other hulk buster toys out there. He plays rough and the toy has held up perfectly. We got the hulk that interacts with the toy which is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love him
customer_reviews.text: This hulk buster is the real deal. He moved into my house on Xmas and got rid of all the other riff raff A real tough hombre for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed on this toy!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is garbage! Right out of the box the prerecorded voice doesn't work and replaced the batteries but still not working. For the price of this toy. Totally not woth it. Really disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: My little guy is a Hulkbuster fanatic
customer_reviews.text: My little guy is so estatic over this. Now we need to complete his collection of these.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 15 days.
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted. My son got this as a Christmas present and 15 days later it just stopped working. Replaced the batteries and nothing. Cool toy if it would last

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson appreciated this purchase and loved it so much.

customer_reviews.title: Voice Box Does not work on this toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4year old son was beyond exited when he got this today by Amazon.. “BUT” I give it 1 star because it makes no sound. It lights up, but the Voice Box does not work at all.. I am very upset, my son is sad... Wish I can get a refund or a new one sent out.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Perez

customer_reviews.title: VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as Christmas Santa gift for my 2.5 year old son
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth Reaza

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: It seems like both of the items we received (one we returned and exchanged for another) where the batteries go in the back, the screw part back doesn’t stay on. That’s why we exchanged it to begin with. After we received the “new” one it did the same exact thing. Definitely not worth the money spend on the toy, but my son just had to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very big!!!
customer_reviews.text: This damn thing is HUGE! I was not expecting it to be that big. My son loves it so I’m good with that.
customer_reviews.author: GTG

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool toy but for the price, and the fact it broke in the first week I have to say I'm disappointed. Does not stand up to role playing. My son was even being extremely careful with it because he loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: alvina Biesenbach-Strickland

customer_reviews.title: great

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Used
customer_reviews.text: Toy arrived damaged and looked as if it had already been used. Paint chipping off the helmet, voice box and noises malfunctioning. Packaging totally destroyed. It looks like it would be a cool toy if it was delivered in the "new" condition that is advertised. Returning for refund.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 and loves this toy. Good quality. Worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this toy, he plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: he liked this toy over the rest that he received on ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my nephew, he liked this toy over the rest that he received on his birthday which makes me the ultimate cool aunt. From what I noticed, no, you cannot put an iron man inside, the limbs have limited mobility if any, and its very tough (not for cuddling) that being said my nephew saw that it was iron hulkmasher thingy and he went crazy for it. As far as i know he still plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: BG15

customer_reviews.title: Cool Toy
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I thought it would be. If you're planning to buy this as a gift, you're probably gonna want to wrap it inside of the Amazon box. There was no plastic cover to prevent the buttons from being pushed and every time it got moved, the toy made noise. Not really a con, just an advisement. We wrapped it as is, and my son knew what it was before opening it. =P Other than, the hulk buster is really cool and my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son just loved it! It is exactly what he wanted to play with his Hulk.
customer_reviews.author: Martin N.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My boys ages 6 and 10 love this guy! And the fact that he talks to the other Avengers is a huge bonus! They love that he interacts with the other interactive Avengers without touching any buttons. They "recognize" each other, its hilarious! This toy is also HUGE compared to the others in the series which makes him alot of fun! We searched around and found the best price here at amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Fun
customer_reviews.text: There are two really positive things about this toy: First, it looks and feels pretty authentic so my boys don't have to imagine too hard to play with it, and second, it is really sturdy. Parents of young boys should know that toys tend to get beaten up pretty quickly. This toy can take a beating and still be fun to play with. The only drawback is that there are not too many recorded catch phrases that the toy says. It can get a little annoying after hearing the same catch phrase for the millionth time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W. Palmere

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool toy- per my 10 year old and myself. He's loved this thing since we got it. It's actually bigger then I realized but that actually was cooler to him. It's heavy duty so he can play hard with it and know an arm isn't going to fall off. It also talks and says 5-6 different phrases. I elite the chest lights up when this happens. A great buy and would work for a birthday or Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Voice died four days after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is cool. The voice only worked for 4 days. I replaced the batteries thinking it was the batteries but it wasn't. Its a lot of money for a toy that only worked from Christmas day until the 29th. It had duracell batteries so I was surprised when I opened it that the voice wasn't working. I'd like to see if I could exchange it but I'd like to receive a replacement before giving this one back.
customer_reviews.author: I. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Hulk Buster Iron Man.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, talks and moves my grandson asked for it. It is a very large action figure. It is still in the box, but it has a flashing light and has several phrases it will randomly speak when you push the button. I am not sure what else it does but it is a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Bwhami

customer_reviews.title: Fit in nicely with my son's growing collection of Avenger figures
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Fit in nicely with my son's growing collection of Avenger figures. He loves this thing and my husband was just as thrilled with it. Took one star off because one of the gold arm plates fell off. My husband was playing with my son and Hulk punched it right off lol. Not sure if they were playing too rough or if it wasn't glued on securely. Just keep that in mind if you're wanting a pristine figure. Great buy though!
customer_reviews.author: Bevin

customer_reviews.title: and he Love It! He really enjoys the interactive part

product_meta.title: Marvel Avengers Titan Hero Tech Interactive Hulk Buster 12 Inch Figure(Discontinued by manufacturer)
product_meta.description: The Avengers face their worst enemy yet, but they've got a secret weapon: Titan Hero Tech! This Interactive Hulk Buster figure has the massive strength of the gamma green superhero, but he combines it with the high tech super armor of Iron Man! He says phrases like “Oh, this is power!” and interacts with other Titan Hero Tech figures (sold separately), saying “Cap, cover the perimeter” to Captain America and “Let's armor up!” to Iron Man Mark 43. His lights and battle sounds will make the battle against Ultron even more epic! Team up your Interactive Hulk Buster figure with his fellow Avengers and start the battle for the fate of the world! Marvel products are produced by Hasbro under license from Marvel Characters B.V.
feature_bullets: High quality toys for children all ages
Electronic Interactive Hulk Buster figure is 12 inches tall
Figure looks like the Hulk but has the armor of Iron Man
Figure works with interactive Hulk Buster figure and other Titan Hero Tech figures (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars535 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
